description:
Brian is desperate to find Zeno before the rest of the Marginal Service does, and his only choice is to seek information from... Rubber Suit?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Hoshi ni Negai o. Star ni wa Guitar to Kousui o
Prie l’étoile et rends-lui ses affaires
When You Wish Upon a Star, a Star Shall Have the Guitar and Perfume
星に願いを. スターにはギターと香水を
